triples.name: Robust control
triples.relevance: Novel robust time-varying formation control methodology proposed to accommodate larger delays and mitigate disturbances in nonlinear multiagent systems.

triples.name: Lyapunov function
triples.relevance: Core mathematical technique used to prove stability of the proposed control system via Lyapunov functional analysis.

triples.name: Particle swarm optimization
triples.relevance: Optimization algorithm employed to optimize the robust time-varying formation control parameters.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Fundamental framework for modeling the coordinated control problem involving multiple autonomous agents.

triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: Application domain validated through simulation of autonomous aerial vehicle swarm systems.

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: Addresses control of one-sided Lipschitz nonlinear multiagent systems, extending beyond linear control methods.

triples.name: Lipschitz continuity
triples.relevance: Mathematical property defining the class of one-sided Lipschitz nonlinear systems addressed by the control methodology.
